product_name: Lezyne Super Drive XL Loaded Front Bike Light with Accessories
long_description: Lezyne Super Drive XL Loaded Front Bike Light offers commuters and evening riders 575 lumens for good visibility in the dark, and this package includes useful accessories for a great overall value. The Lezyne Super Drive XL Loaded Front Bike Light package includes light, handlebar mount, helmet mount, spare battery pack, Micro USB charging cable and storage case. A single high-performance LED emits a 575-lumen beam that runs for 1.5 hrs. on high and 12 hrs. on flashing; recharge after your ride with the included USB cable. Light can be seen from the side to enhance visibility in traffic. A specialized power-saving mode allows quick switching between high lighting and medium lighting to optimize the use of power for any occasion. Power Indicator button allows the user to check the power level at any time.
short_description: Lezyne Super Drive XL Loaded Front Bike Light offers commuters and evening riders 575 lumens for good visibility in the dark, and this package includes useful accessories for a great overall value.
